description: HCL Domino is susceptible to a Denial of Service vulnerability due to improper validation of user-supplied input, potentially giving an attacker the ability to crash the server. Versions previous to release 9.0.1 FP10 IF6 and release 10.0.1 are affected.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: versions previous to release 9.0.1 FP10 IF6
